forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers developing after midnight. Low around 0C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers developing after midnight. Low 33F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow diminishing in the morning. Partial clearing in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning becoming partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low around 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
